Title: S22U trouble with Google Messages
Content:
Been having some issues and just wondering if anyone is having similar issues or can point me in the right direction. As you can see in the attachment, having trouble with Chat connecting, disconnecting, refusing to send. Frustrating when I think I send a message through Android auto only to arrive at my destination and he never got it because it never sent. Trying to do some trouble shooting on my own before going in to TMO. FWIW he is on a Fold 4, other son is on a pixel 7 but it doesn't happen as frequently with him. Any thoughts appreciated  
Sent from my SM-S908U using Tapatalk

Title: Minimize - maximize required to transition screen
Content:
This first occurred a few months ago after an automatic OS update. In most apps if I click an option that would normally take me to another screen, nothing happens. I have to minimize the app and then maximize it to see the screen change. This was corrected with one update but is back. Don't think I'm running anything that would affect my display settings. 
Any ideas or suggestions to fix this problem? 
Galaxy S22 Android 13

Title: Trade in values from 2022
Content:
I currently own the Pixel 7 pro but I am very intrigued by S23 Ultra with the updated camera sensor and Snapdragon chip. I don't think the pixel will get a good trade in for Samsung S23 Ultra. 
For those that have the S22 Ultra when you purchased it from Samsung did you trade in a phone and what trade in value did Samsung give you when you traded it in. 
I'm contemplating buying a used Ultra S21 or S22 for trade in for the new Ultra

Title: Anyone has any idea how to disable the edit mode on lock screen? I keep on activating it whenever I use the fingerprint scanner.
S908U1UES2BWA2 Update and Bluetooth Issues
Content:
Hey hey. Anyone else having issues with the [S908U1UES2BWA2](https://doc.samsungmobile.com/SM-S908U1/XAA/doc.html) over-the-air update and Bluetooth? After installing this, my Xbox Elite Series 2 stopped working and now I can no longer pair it. Additionally,  my SPen also stopped connecting. Interestingly enough, other Bluetooth devices such as earbuds, watches, computers still pair and work appropriately.

I'm thinking this has to be a bug with the specific Bluetooth profile being used by these devices (BLE, maybe?), but wanted to check with ya'll before found any deeper. 

Any trouble shooting advice is greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance!

comment:

Thanks for the feedback. I was finally able to get bluetooth devices to reconnect by resetting the network settings

45w small charger for the S22Ultra And a 65w laptop?
Content: Hi! Just wandering if there exist a portable small charger that has the 45w ultra super ultra fast 2.0 blah blah for the S22u and also is capable to charge 65w needs through USB c of a modern laptop... I use to have a 65w portable charger (also worked at 25w for the phone) but it stopped working after couple of years.. The idea is to carry only one small charger for both and to enjoy the crazy blah blah 45w on the S22Ultra. I don't need something to charge both at the same time, really prefer to keep it as small as possible. Is there anything like that out there?

Title: Plastic film that came with the phone.
Content: Weird question, but my s22 ultra came with a clear plastic film on the front screen and a black plastic film on the back. Will leaving the black film on the back of my phone cause any physical damage? Thanks.

Title: Not able to make calls when on 5g
Content:
I'm using 5G(Jio) on the 2nd sim in S22 Ultra(India), when I switch on the 5G I can able to use the internet and call without any issues, but after a few minutes the VoLTE symbol is not visible also not able to call anyone also not receiving any calls... the calling functionality is disabled but able to use the internet without any issues. 

Tried Aeroplane mode, but not working.

After disabling and enabling the Sim card setting only the calling functionality work. 

Again it will disable after a few minutes. 

I didn't face this issue in LTE.

Is anyone facing an issue like this? Any idea about this?

Title: Coming from Iphone. What do you like most about the Sultra line up
Content:
I had a z fold 4 and that was amazing. However I wasn’t sure if I should stick with the z fold 4 or maybe get the Sultra line as the ultra line up is peak smartphone maturity and the z fold 4 does indeed have some hardware issues still. 

I tested the z fold all while still of course using my trusty iPhones 13 pro max. I returned the fold and now ordered an s22 ultra. Yes I know the 23 is releasing soon but I just got this on a discount.

Just wondering for folks that decided to buy the 22 ultra. Why not the z fold 4, what made you choose the ultra other than price differences

Title: rectangle around the fingerprint scanner
Content:
Today i noticed a rectangle around the fingerprint Scanner. It is only noticeble when the Light reflects on the Display. Thats why it is Hard to get a picture of it. Is this normal?

comment:

It's normal. The screen is see-through. It's been there since SGS10.

Title: Why Is My Front Facing Video All Wiggly And Distorted?

Is there a way to make the apps color themed while also having an icon pack for the rest? Because when I apply the icon pack via theme park the themed apps return to default (the ones that I didn't change)
Are these toggles disabled by default on a13 on the S22u developer options?
Should I upgrade to S23U or wait for S24U
Content: I purchased my S21U on Marketplace open box with the plastic film still attached for $400. I then trade in for a s22u 256gb because I prefer the note series' square shape. I've been using s22u since July, and the s22u and watch 4 cost me around 600 dollars. Is it reasonable to trade in for a s23u for a better battery because I have to charge my s22u three times a day? (4hrs sot). I use the camera frequently, so I'm not sure about the first generation of 200mp because I'm afraid of optimizing problems like cannot focus when first using 108mp on s20u.

Title: S23 Ultra, yes please.
Content:
So I upgraded from the 13 pro max last year and it was a huge transition & a rather good one but One UI 4.1 was a straight up disastrous software but the One UI 5 did help a lot more. I never faced any lag issues but the frame drops & stutters ugh just made the experience feel bad. 

Now though, very good overall and as it stands I'm too used to the S Pen to give it up now, so another brand is a no go. 

In any case I'm going for the 23 Ultra, whatever it may turn out to be, as long as the performance which in so far is looking more solid ( I'm hoping it was the SoC w this ie the 8 gen 1 and how much of a difference 8+ gen 1 made) and hopefully smoother yes I'm going for it.

Title: PSA with this latest update - all my alarms were disabled after the phone updated overnight
Content: I'm used to having to unlock my phone after restart before *most* things work, of course, but alarms (and weather emergency warnings) usually still work. Not the case this time, which makes updating overnight a lot less convenient.

Title: Adaptive Refresh Rate
Content:
Hello 
How are you?

I would like to find out do you use your S22 On A 60GHz or 120GHZ refresh rate

Title: New Processor = Better Thermals during Summer?
Content:
My main issue right now with the Galaxy s22 is that during summer time, especially in the car, the phone will thermal throttle to the point where it's almost unusable. It works just fine during winter months.

While I understand that the Snapdragon 8 gen 2 should theoretically be much more efficient and run less hot than the Snapdragon 8 gen 1, can we expect that to help in hot weather or is it just inevitable for any phone that exists to thermal throttle under high ambient temperature?

Title: Any regrets going from S22U to S22plus?
Content: For any of those that have downgraded from s22 ultra to s22 plus, has there been any regrets? Asking because I currently own the s22 Ultra and and highly considering the s23 Plus for screen size and ergonomics. However downgrade in camera quality and a few other things would make it feel less premium. Also depending on the trade-in values. But just wondering if anyone ever got bored of the s22 Plus or plan on switching back to the ultra models?

Title: upgrading my base s22
Content: I've owned the base galaxy s22 for almost 7 months now. I love the quality of the display, camera, speakers and pretty much everything about the phone. My only issue with it is the battery life. I work a job where I have to take calls frequently and not having good battery life has really made that an issue. Should I look into getting an s22+ or s22 ultra, or wait until the s23 comes out to see if that would work better for me?

Title: Congratulations Samsung!! You are roling out january 1 update on January 25 for s22 !! :)
Content: I remember that samsung promised to roll out updates eaxtly on yime for s22 series  at least for its first year..... . I think it was a bad decision to support 5 year updates for A series ! So it is the result of that decision. 😃

Title: Warranty question
Content: I'm going to a Samsung store and looking to get my phone repaired under warranty, any clue what I need to prepare /bring?

Title: S22 Ultra to Z fold 4 to S23 Ultra
Content:
In October, I decided to try my first foldable. I had S22 Ultra 1TB and moved to Z fold 4 1TB. The phone is AMAZING. I must say I might have difficulty moving to a slab phone once again. Meanwhile, the camera is decent, not the best as well as the narrow main screen. I still love the multitasking , the unfolded screen as well ...etc. 
Now that the S23 Ultra release date is fast approaching, I'm debating what to do. Should I try it and keep the fold for a while or just wait for fold 5? 
The problem that I noticed in foldable phones is that the depreciation value is CRAZY compared to the S series. I will definitely take a big hit. 
Thought to ask the big group out there ?

Title: trade in question for galaxy s22
Content: This is the first galaxy phone that I hate,  battery is trash. The screen gets tiny little scratches for no reason. It has a few scuffs but otherwise perfect phone. Does t mobile only accept pristine phones as trade ins?

Title: Do you think it will be worth to switch from S22 Ultra to S23 Ultra just for battery life and signal reception?
Content:
I'm happy with my S22U, but battery life and signal reception is sub par for me. 

Do you think it would be worth the switch just for battery life and better signal? I saw SG8gen2 battery life ranging from 5,5hours to 8,5 hours of SOT, so not sure about it.

Thanks for some insight.

Title: S9 upgrade to S21 or S 21FE or S22?
Content:
Hey there, you must've seen a lot of posts like mine these couple of years. I've been looking for a new phone for a while now. I first looked at the S22+, but it is a lot more expensive than the others and a lot bigger. I'm not looking at the price of these three though.I'm looking for a phone that has a decent battery duration while SOT, no overheating and that it can handle multiple apps well. All phones have better cameras than mine, so I'm not paying attention to that either. I've heard mostly complaints about the battery of the S22, but is it really that bad and dramatic?What have your experiences been like? Is your phone good at my preffered specs? Thanks in advance!  


ETA: I'm not interested in the S23.

Title: Need to customize group ringtones on S22 and it reverts to Default
Content: I need to be able to assign my contact groups different ringtones. I go through the steps:Contacts App > Find your groups (the 3 horizontal lines on top left) > Select a group > click the edit button (the pen icon) > Select group ringtone (allowed permissions for media)... there is no save button after choosing a ringtone. If I close out of the app and reopen it and check the ringtone for groups, it says Default. If I choose the ringtone I want and hit the back button, it reverts to default. Any trick I am missing to make the customized ringtone save?

Title: Android/ OneUI Feature Request Re: Folders
Content: I don't know the appropriate place for this, but...I may read left to right but I, like many, an right-handed. Option to organize apps in folders aligning danglers to the right of grid instead of left please.

Title: I've got a great suggestion for AOD
Content: You know how samsung can edit pictures very well.I think that we should be able to take that into AOD and be able to cut out specific parts of an image and place it on the AOD.An example would be an image of a vehicle. Where I would be able to cut out a car from my wallpaper and make only the car show up on the AOD. Once you double tap to show lock screen, the brightness increases and fully uncovers the background of the image.You could also do this with dogs or people's faces, and any objects you want to show on your AOD.Obviously there are problems where the clock and notification could in the way, but there should be an option to manually chose where to place those. If you wanted you could place it on the side or above the cut out you want to show.
